The plane had 15 people
on board, including eight crew members and seven
passengers. The incident happened at about 13:00
Moscow time, or about 17:00
Vietnam time. The plane crashed near a
village, causing a fire, but it was
contained.  extinguished and there were no casualties
on the ground. The Russian Ministry of Defense said
one of the plane's engines caught
fire while
the Russian Ministry of Defense announced that it had

condition of those on the plane.
